scripts.say: The Royal Islands
So you ended up fighting after all? What was the outcome?
Of course we won. The night belongs to us, after all.
Formidable sipped on her tea elegantly as she gave her report to her sisters.
While Sardegna's ships are equipped with heavy armor, they don't have fire control radars.
As a result, Warspite and I made quick work of them.
An expected result, but well done nevertheless.
Finally, the three sisters could enjoy a moment of peace together.
Aww, I also wanted to beat up some enemies, in an elegant way that only a goddess of victory like me could accomplish! How unfair~
By the way, our fourth sister will soon be joining us, and the Royal Navy will grow even stronger.
And of course, our sororal tea parties will become a little livelier~
Ah! I wonder what our new sister will look like. Could she possibly be cuter than Formidable? Hehehe~
Victorious pinched Formidable's cheeks as she teased her.
Oh, yes, I nearly forgot. That Sardegnian warship, Lit... Litter-something? She asked me to pass along a message for you, Illustrious.
...That was the very spirited one, if I recall? What did she have to say?
Um, if I'm remembering this correctly... "When the Passions of this land fade at last, let us reignite the Passion between us." Dreadfully baroque, if you ask me.
One never quite knows what those bunch are up to... I suppose they have plenty of problems to deal with internally...
Huh? What's going on?
Hey, that's my line! What's the meaning of this, having a secret tea party behind my back?!
Queen Elizabeth, while strolling through the garden with her entourage, saw the sisters gathered for tea.
Madam Illustrious, Madam Victorious, Madam Formidable, good day to you.
Good day, Your Majesty. Belfast.
As it happens, Your Majesty has excellent timing. The tea is just ready~ And may I offer you some treats from my trip to the Aegean?
Won't you join us for sweets and a spot of scintillating conversation~?
